rubrics.requirements: Core Validation Engine - The fundamental validation processing system that orchestrates rule definition, execution, and result generation

sub_tasks.requirements: Validation Rule Definition and Composition System - Framework for declaring, structuring, and combining validation constraints using fluent interfaces
Validator Class Abstraction - Base class system that serves as containers for validation rules specific to model types
AbstractValidator<T> Implementation - Generic base class providing rule definition infrastructure for type T
Fluent Rule Declaration - Property targeting using RuleFor() with chainable validation methods
Built-in Validator Library - Comprehensive set of pre-implemented validation logic for common data constraints
Existence Validators - Presence and absence validation (NotNull, NotEmpty, Empty, Null)
Comparison Validators - Value comparison logic against constants or other properties (Equal, NotEqual, LessThan, GreaterThan)
Range and Length Validators - Numeric boundaries and string/collection length constraints (Length, MinLength, MaxLength, InclusiveBetween, ExclusiveBetween)
Format and Pattern Validators - Structure and format constraints (RegularExpression, Email, CreditCard)
Type Validation - Data type conformity checks (Enum, EnumName, PrecisionScale)
Custom Validator Extension System - Architecture for implementing domain-specific validation logic beyond built-in validators
Inline Predicate Validators - Simple lambda-based custom validation rules defined inline
Reusable Property Validator Classes - Complex validation logic encapsulated in PropertyValidator inheritance for cross-validator reuse
Custom Message Placeholder System - Dynamic error message generation with contextual runtime data injection
Rule Composition and Chaining - System for combining multiple validation constraints and controlling execution flow
Sequential Rule Execution - Ordered processing of multiple validation rules on the same property
Rule Reusability and Inclusion - Mechanisms for sharing validation logic across validators using Include() method
Conditional Rule Application - Context-dependent rule activation using When/Unless predicates
Dependent Rule Relationships - Inter-rule dependencies where subsequent rules execute only if prerequisites pass
Validation Execution Control System - Runtime process for applying defined rules with configurable behavior and flow control
Manual Validation Invocation - Primary execution mechanism through explicit Validate() method calls on validator instances
Asynchronous Validation Engine - Non-blocking validation execution supporting I/O-bound operations and async rules
Async Rule Processing - Concurrent execution of validation logic with async/await support
Async Testing Framework - Validation testing utilities for asynchronous validation scenarios
Cascade Mode Management - Configurable validation flow control and early termination behavior
Multi-Level Cascade Configuration - Cascade mode settings at global, validator class, and individual rule levels
Stop-on-First-Failure vs Continue-All-Rules - Configurable behavior for handling validation failures within property rule chains
Selective Validation System - Targeted validation execution for specific properties or rule groups
RuleSet-based Validation - Named rule groups allowing selective execution of specific validation scenarios
Property-Specific Validation - Isolated validation targeting only specified object properties
Pre-Validation Hooks - Overrideable PreValidate() method for custom logic execution before rule processing
Complex Object Validation System - Handles nested objects, collections, and inheritance scenarios with recursive validation capabilities
Nested Object Validation - Recursive validation of complex property structures and object graphs
Property Chain Navigation - Deep object graph traversal enabling validation of nested complex properties
Validator Composition - Application of dedicated validators to complex property types for modular validation design
Collection Validation Engine - Specialized handling of enumerable data structures with element-wise validation
Simple Type Collection Validation - Direct validation rules applied to primitive type collections
Complex Type Collection Validation - Nested object validation within collections using dedicated validators for each element
Inheritance Validation Support - Validation behavior across class hierarchies with automatic rule propagation
Base Class Rule Inheritance - Automatic application of base class validator rules to derived class instances

rubrics.requirements: Validation Result and Error Management System - Comprehensive handling of validation outcomes, error reporting, and failure processing

sub_tasks.requirements: Validation Result Processing - Structured representation and manipulation of validation outcomes with detailed failure information
Result Object Model - ValidationResult containing IsValid boolean flag and ValidationFailure collection
Exception-based Failure Handling - Configurable ValidationException throwing instead of result object return
Custom State Attachment - Arbitrary metadata association with validation failures for application-specific data
Error Message Generation and Customization - Dynamic error message creation with internationalization and templating support
Customizable Error Messages - Override default messages with custom strings including property name and value placeholders
Message Placeholder System - Template-based error message generation with runtime data injection
Localization Engine - Integration with .NET localization and resource management for multi-language error messages
Custom Error Code Assignment - Unique string-based error codes for structured error identification and categorization
Error Severity Classification - Hierarchical failure importance using severity levels (Error, Warning, Info)
Value Transformation System - Pre-validation data manipulation and normalization capabilities
Property Value Transformation - Runtime data conversion and sanitization before passing to subsequent validators

rubrics.requirements: Framework Integration Layer - Seamless integration adapters and extensions for various .NET application frameworks

sub_tasks.requirements: ASP.NET Core Integration - Deep integration with modern ASP.NET Core pipeline and services
Dependency Injection Integration - Automatic validator discovery, registration, and lifecycle management with IoC containers
Automatic Validator Registration - Convention-based assembly scanning and validator registration with service collection extensions
Registration Filtering - Selective validator registration based on specified criteria and conditions
Automatic Model Validation Pipeline - Seamless integration with ASP.NET Core model binding for incoming request validation
Model Binding Integration - Automatic validation trigger for controller action arguments and model parameters
Action Filter-based Validation - Custom validation execution points in the request processing pipeline
Client-Side Validation Support - Browser-side validation enablement through metadata generation
HTML5 Data Attribute Generation - Automatic generation of data-* attributes for client-side validation libraries
Minimal API Integration - Validation support for lightweight ASP.NET Core endpoints with helpers and filters
Legacy Framework Support - Integration packages for older .NET web framework versions
ASP.NET MVC 5 Integration - Classic MVC framework validation support with model binding integration
ASP.NET WebAPI 2 Integration - REST API validation framework support for legacy web services
Blazor Integration - Client-side web application validation support with real-time form validation
Blazor Component Validation - Interactive web component integration with real-time validation feedback

rubrics.requirements: Development and Testing Support System - Comprehensive tools and utilities for validator development, testing, and advanced customization

sub_tasks.requirements: Validation Testing Framework - Specialized testing utilities and fluent APIs for validator verification and testing
TestValidate Method - Fluent testing API providing simplified unit test development for validator classes
Asynchronous Testing Support - Testing framework extensions for async validation scenarios and I/O-bound operations
Advanced Configuration and Extensibility Features - Extended customization mechanisms for complex validation scenarios
Root Context Data Management - Shared data propagation mechanism allowing arbitrary data flow from initial Validate() call to custom validators
